title: HashiCorp earns Comparably awards for company and teams
content:
We are thrilled and humbled to share that HashiCorp has received awards from Comparably in 2023 in four categories:

  • Best Company Outlook
  • Best Marketing Teams
  • Best Sales Teams
  • Best HR Teams

Comparably, which honors companies with Best Places to Work Awards, is a culture and compensation platform that uses employee reviews to provide a comprehensive representation of what it is like to work at various companies. The Best Company Outlook award is determined based on feedback from HashiCorp employees who provided reviews on Comparably. The Marketing, Sales, and HR awards collected reviews regarding work-life balance, professional development opportunities, perks, and benefits. Because Comparably awards are determined by ratings from a company’s own employees, this recognition is especially meaningful for us.

We’re incredibly proud of the culture we have built, and we are honored that HashiCorp employees have used their voices to share feedback that has resulted in several awards for HashiCorp. As a team, we are dedicated to creating a collaborative community that is inclusive and engaging, where every employee can show up as their authentic self, and where every employee feels empowered and is able to do their best work.

Now, on to the awards!

Best Company Outlook

For this award, Comparably collected feedback from employees about their confidence level for the future success of the company, their excitement about going to work each day, and if they would recommend HashiCorp to a friend. To us, receiving the Best Outlook recognition lets us know that our goal of creating an environment where each employee can do their best work is being met.

We are on a mission to build and deliver products that enable organizations to deliver essential services to the world. That means we have a big responsibility to our customers, it requires our team to be working in lock-step to deliver, and it also means each employee has an abundance of opportunity to make a significant impact while growing their careers with us.

Best Marketing Teams

Products don’t go to market or drive adoption on their own. The highly collaborative marketing team connects the needs of enterprises and practitioners with our intuitive, workflow-driven products. The marketing team aims to help users solve problems as simply and quickly as possible using HashiCorp products and technology. Rooted in truth-telling and integrity, we leverage customer insights to bring the HashiCorp story to life with data-led precision and clear, helpful information.

The growing HashiCorp marketing team consists of product marketing, corporate marketing, worldwide field marketing, digital marketing, developer relations, community, and events.

“It’s so exciting to see the HashiCorp marketing team recognized as a Best Marketing Team," said Marc Holmes, HashiCorp CMO. "Marketing at HashiCorp is a unique experience with so much surface area and opportunity with which to build, and so it’s a privilege to serve this team and see them move each of our functions from strength to strength: creative vision, messaging, campaigns, and experiences that help to educate and inform our audiences while delivering joy and delight and earning respect and trust. I want to thank everyone in marketing for their ongoing contributions to help us continue to build HashiCorp into a once-in-a-generation company.”

"I have worked for several years at HashiCorp because it is a wonderful organization to be a part of — and specifically within marketing,” added Meghan Liese, VP of Product Marketing at HashiCorp. “It is a joy to work with products that practitioners love and a product suite that enables organizations in their cloud journey, and most importantly with co-workers and partners who show up every day to do great things."

Best Sales Teams

Through end-to-end engagement from pre-sale to post-sale, our sales team builds partnerships that help organizations as they transition to, and operate in, the cloud. Our sales team is dedicated to helping customers achieve the fastest path to value in a modern, multi-cloud environment.

Our growing worldwide field organization consists of sales, solutions engineers, customer success, and professional services. We are currently hiring for many roles across the org:

“Leading the Worldwide Field Organization at HashiCorp is an incredible privilege. Our sales teams consist of some of the most talented and hard-working individuals I’ve worked with throughout my career,” commented HashiCorp CRO Brandon Sweeney. “Each day, these individuals inspire me with their determination, grit, and relentless efforts to drive our customers' mission — as we work together to build a world-class field organization.”

“What I think is great about HashiCorp as a workplace is the emphasis on people first, both from the customer side and employee side," explained Taylor Hoagland, Manager, Inside Sales, at HashiCorp. "Not only is HashiCorp raising the bar of innovation on our go-to-market strategies, but we’re also raising the bar on internal satisfaction, engagement, and diversity/inclusion.”

Best HR Teams

People are at the core of HashiCorp, and our HR team is tasked with creating an environment where each employee can build a successful and fulfilling career. Our People team helps recruit, nurture, and retain our workforce through meaningful programs and professional development. From talent acquisition and talent development to diversity and inclusion initiatives as well as competitive benefits, our People team deeply supports employees to excel in their journeys at HashiCorp.

“We are honored that HashiCorp has been recognized by Comparably for several awards. This is a testament to the hard work and dedication of our team, who strive for excellence every day,” said Jeff Harper, HashiCorp’s Chief People Officer. “Our HR team is committed to this mission and work tirelessly to ensure that every employee feels valued and supported, and we are thrilled to see that our employees share our vision and are just as enthusiastic about HashiCorp's future as we are.”

Thank you to our HashiCorp employees and to Comparably for recognizing us! These awards remind us how far we have come and reinforce our commitment to our employees. Want to join us? You can see our open roles on our careers page, opt-in to join our talent community, and learn more about HashiCorp on our About Us page.
author: Kate Caulfield
